DummySpawnManager.h

00001 #ifndef _PASSENGER_DUMMY_SPAWN_MANAGER_H_
00002 #define _PASSENGER_DUMMY_SPAWN_MANAGER_H_
00003 
00004 // TODO: make this path not hardcoded
00005 #define DUMMY_REQUEST_HANDLER_EXECUTABLE "/home/hongli/Projects/mod_rails/benchmark/DummyRequestHandler"
00006 
00007 #include <string>
00008 
00009 #include <sys/types.h>
00010 #include <sys/wait.h>
00011 #include <cstdio>
00012 #include <unistd.h>
00013 #include <errno.h>
00014 
00015 #include "Application.h"
00016 #include "Exceptions.h"
00017 
00018 namespace Passenger {
00019 
00020 using namespace std;
00021 
00022 /**
00023  * A dummy SpawnManager replacement for testing/debugging purposes.
00024  *
00025  * This class implements a dummy spawn manager, and is 100% interface-compatible with
00026  * SpawnManager. This spawn manager will spawn <tt>benchmark/DummyRequestHandler</tt>,
00027  * which is probably the fastest possible implementation of a request handler. The purpose
00028  * of this class to benchmark the performance of the Apache module (i.e. not benchmarking
00029  * the Ruby request handler or Rails itself).
00030  *
00031  * This header file is not used by default. Define the macro <tt>PASSENGER_USE_DUMMY_SPAWN_MANAGER</tt>
00032  * to make ApplicationPool use DummySpawnManager instead of SpawnManager.
00033  *
00034  * Of course, don't forget to compile benchmark/DummyRequestHandler!
00035  *
00036  * @ingroup Support
00037  */
00038 class DummySpawnManager {
00039 public:
00040         ApplicationPtr spawn(const string &appRoot, const string &user = "", const string &group = "") {
00041                 int fds[2];
00042                 pid_t pid;
00043                 
00044                 if(socketpair(AF_UNIX, SOCK_STREAM, 0, fds) == -1) {
00045                         throw SystemException("Cannot create a Unix socket", errno);
00046                 }
00047                 pid = fork();
00048                 if (pid == 0) {
00049                         pid = fork();
00050                         if (pid == 0) {
00051                                 dup2(fds[0], STDIN_FILENO);
00052                                 close(fds[0]);
00053                                 close(fds[1]);
00054                                 execlp(DUMMY_REQUEST_HANDLER_EXECUTABLE, DUMMY_REQUEST_HANDLER_EXECUTABLE, NULL);
00055                                 int e = errno;
00056                                 fprintf(stderr, "Unable to run %s: %s\n", DUMMY_REQUEST_HANDLER_EXECUTABLE, strerror(e));
00057                                 fflush(stderr);
00058                                 _exit(1);
00059                         } else if (pid == -1) {
00060                                 perror("Cannot fork a new process");
00061                                 fflush(stderr);
00062                                 _exit(1);
00063                         } else {
00064                                 _exit(0);
00065                         }
00066                 } else if (pid == -1) {
00067                         close(fds[0]);
00068                         close(fds[1]);
00069                         throw SystemException("Cannot fork a new process", errno);
00070                 } else {
00071                         close(fds[0]);
00072                         waitpid(pid, NULL, 0);
00073                         return ApplicationPtr(new Application(appRoot, pid, fds[1]));
00074                 }
00075         }
00076 };
00077 
00078 } // namespace Passenger
00079 
00080 #endif /* _PASSENGER_DUMMY_SPAWN_MANAGER_H_ */
